titles.title: For the relief of Rommel Villanueva Herrera.
For the relief of Rommel Villanueva Herrera.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: Declares Rommel Villanueva Herrera to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
